```{r}
library(HSAUR)
library(faraway)
library(MASS)
library(brlr)
library(survival)
```

```{r}
data("plasma", package = "HSAUR")

cdplot(ESR ~ fibrinogen, data = plasma)

plasma_glm_1 <- glm(ESR ~ fibrinogen, data = plasma, 
                    family = binomial())

summary(plasma_glm_1)

probitmod <- glm(ESR ~ fibrinogen, data = plasma, 
                 family = binomial(link=probit))
```
